entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 1:41 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
